name: Furious Bike Fight Race
description:
‘Furious bike Fight’ is a motorcycle racing game where player participates in violent, illegal street races.

This game brings you the unique feature of being able to attack rivals while you race at high speed.

The player can fight other bikers with a variety of hand weapons or simple punches and kicks.

Do whatever it takes to win.

Even if that means clubbing your opponents into the tarmac with a baseball bat!
